content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the user, I generated an image with a list of top travel destinations including Cuba, Hoi An, Chiang Mai, Lanzarote, Vienna, Bucharest, Brussels, and Copenhagen. I then browsed the website https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions to find out the top attractions in the world, which were Santuario Historico de Machu Picchu in Peru, Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Center in Abu Dhabi, St. Peter\'s Basilica in Vatican City, and Angkor Wat in Cambodia. I saved the top attractions to a file named "top_attractions.txt". Later, I used the command "read_file" to retrieve the content of the file and "google" to search for Machu Picchu.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machu_Picchu", "https://whc.unesco.org/en/list/274/", "https://www.youvisit.com/tour/machupicchu", "https://www.nationalgeographic.com/travel/article/secrets", "https://machupicchuboston.com/", "https://www.britannica.com/place/Machu-Picchu", "https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas/adventure-travel/how-to-travel-to-machu-picchu", "https://www.peru.travel/en/attractions/machu-picchu"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machu_Picchu", "question": "What is Machu Picchu?"}}}'}]
"""
